Title: Silent Night, Deadly Night
Writer: Paul Caimi (based on a story by), Michael Hickey
Actors: Lilyan Chauvin, Gilmer McCormick, Toni Nero, Robert Brian Wilson
Plot: After seeing his parents murdered in front of him a young bit spends most of his life in an orphanage where he is abused by the mother superior when he turns into a teenager he gets a job as a department store santa and when he sees two people having sex in the store he gets flashbacks when his parents and when he can't take it anymore he turns into a santa serial killer.
